name: Platdude's Minecart Challenge
description:
Platdude's having one heck of a day in his Minecart.

Grab as many stars as you can, to rack up enough power for an EPIC boost at the end of the track.

-=-=-

This is a test game to test how well GotoJSE's new Player functionality works on itch.io.  The game itself was written using BASIC, at GotoJSE.com
